message.body: Is it a particular brand or type?
The infamous single component polyurethane! I might have some of that on hand. Was the other stuff a two part mix it deal that smells awful?
i don't remember the smell, but it was a two part mix. i think one part was gray and one was white.
did you listen to that tam show about coincidence?!
Is that the one they most recently broadcast? If so it is a repeat i have heard. Not that i remember diddly about it. Was it good enough to listen to again? I still have it.
it wasn't the most recent episode because i fell behind. it was the one with listener submitted stories?
That rings more of a bell. Like a month or two ago.
The thing i remember from that one was the guy who found a picture of his twin brother pasted on the far side of the window blind in his new office.
what! that must be in the last five minutes of the show that i haven't watched yet.
I remember a picture so it might have been only on the web site.
